actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional itemized deduction for individuals who rent their principal residences.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals an income tax deduction for 25 percent of the amounts paid to rent their principal residences.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional itemized deduction for individuals who rent their principal residences.
